audioText: Dans ce récit médiéval, tu changeras d'avis sur le seigneur quand tu découvriras sa véritable nature généreuse.
question: When will you change your mind about the lord in this medieval story?
options: When you discover his true generous nature
When you learn about his military victories against enemies
When you see his magnificent castle and valuable treasures
When you witness his skill in hunting and horseback riding
explanation: The correct answer is 'When you discover his true generous nature'. The text states 'Dans ce récit médiéval, tu changeras d'avis sur le seigneur quand tu découvriras sa véritable nature généreuse' - In this medieval story, you will change your mind about the lord when you discover his true generous nature. 'Changeras' is the future form of 'changer' (to change), and 'seigneur' means 'lord'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - medieval storytelling context
